nodes.text: A thruster stabilizer was a type of stabilizer used on engines. BTL Y-wing starfighters were equipped with thruster stabilizers.

In 22 BBY, while attempting to pass through Kaliida Nebula, Shadow Squadron pilot Matchstick's portside thruster stabilizer was damaged when his Y-wing was hit by the wing of a Neebray. When they were attacked by vulture droids, Matchstick's crippled stabilizer exploded and the ship crashed into another fighter and was destroyed.
